channel.title: How could i
channel.description:
*Get Statius Warhammer spec gfx in a 317? *Get a Vesta Long Sword spec gfx in a 317? *Make a new attack interface like runescape and 2 speced? *get all prayers and spirts of it, the same as real runescape and 2 speced? *Make a client like bluurs, but be able to play on a delta client (if i put the special code for it to work ppl are disabled and have the name afgxsjdk30bn something like that. *make a specific weapon like a dart or something hit fast like 2 times (the same like runescape) *Get all the models for Crossbow Bolts like real runescape *Fix xlog *fix duping *Make Arrows drop when hit on an enemy like runescape *Make a Pest Control that gives you Str, mage, attack, defence and range xp for your points? ( like runescape) *Put Kq and Godwars in my server *Get the proper Godsword standing emotes like runescape and godsword hitting emotes in a 317 or something simillar *get the proper BLITZ gfx where the ice particles come of you and to your enemy *Get the models for chicken suit *Make Pvp PK POINTS *make dragon arrows instead of ice arrows in a 317 *Make onyx bolts *make all the dragons look real like in runescape *get model to anti fire potion *Fix my Dang dclaws making it 1def not 60def without making all dragon armour items 1def like i done now.
OK thats it, btw you don't need to answer these questions all at once, but i'd like that tho. anyways ty and i hope you'll reply to this post ~~~~~~~~~~~~~cowbell~~~~~~~~~~~~~

item.title: How could i
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:17, topic:279721”][quote author=georges link=topic=369107.msg2797383#msg2797383 date=1243153768]

*Get Statius Warhammer spec gfx in a 317?
*Get a Vesta Long Sword spec gfx in a 317?
*Make a new attack interface like runescape and 2 speced?
*get all prayers and spirts of it, the same as real runescape and 2 speced?
*Make a client like bluurs, but be able to play on a delta client (if i put the special code for it to work ppl are disabled and have the name afgxsjdk30bn something like that.
*make a specific weapon like a dart or something hit fast like 2 times (the same like runescape)
*Get all the models for Crossbow Bolts like real runescape
*Fix xlog
*fix duping
*Make Arrows drop when hit on an enemy like runescape
*Make a Pest Control that gives you Str, mage, attack, defence and range xp for your points? ( like runescape)
*Put Kq and Godwars in my server
*Get the proper Godsword standing emotes like runescape and godsword hitting emotes in a 317 or something simillar
*get the proper BLITZ gfx where the ice particles come of you and to your enemy
*Get the models for chicken suit
*Make Pvp PK POINTS
*make dragon arrows instead of ice arrows in a 317
*Make onyx bolts
*make all the dragons look real like in runescape
*get model to anti fire potion
*Fix my Dang dclaws making it 1def not 60def without making all dragon armour items 1def like i done now.

OK thats it, btw you don’t need to answer these questions all at once, but i’d like that tho.
anyways ty and i hope you’ll reply to this post
~cowbell~

Learn Java, and don’t ask to be spoonfed.

Go away please ,
he want some help , wow , Go learn java urself ffs…
We don’t need you xD

@Ontopic , cowbell what do you need more?

Georgio
[/quote]
You probably can’t even create a class containing an array, lols.[/quote]

Wahaha fucking nerd , wanna bet??

Georgio

Read full topic

item.title: How could i
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

*Get Statius Warhammer spec gfx in a 317?
You have to import the Modle like you do for the Items, NPC, and Emotes thenhave all the proper information with them
*Get a Vesta Long Sword spec gfx in a 317?
Look at above answer
*Make a new attack interface like runescape and 2 speced?
The best thing to do is just to get the newer modles and just import them in, I am sure there was a tut around here somewhere that showed how to add new interfaces into Clients, just do that tut but use the new skills interfaces.
*make a specific weapon like a dart or something hit fast like 2 times (the same like runescape)
EventManager/Timers
*fix duping
Which doupe there are a few of them
*Get the proper Godsword standing emotes like runescape and godsword hitting emotes in a 317 or something simillar
You would just import the Emote Model
*get the proper BLITZ gfx where the ice particles come of you and to your enemy
EventManager/Timers and again import the models
*Make Pvp PK POINTS
The same as any point system 
if (p2.isDead) {
    PkPoints++;
}

This is not the right way just example of how simple

*make dragon arrows instead of ice arrows in a 317
… again import models
*Make onyx bolts
import models
*make all the dragons look real like in runescape
Import the NPC models
*Fix my Dang dclaws making it 1def not 60def without making all dragon armour items 1def like i done now.

if (itemName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ITEMHERE”)) {
/* Level infor here and return 1 instead of 60 */
}

or go by the id of the item, your call really

you do know that most of these are all about importing the models, why not just make a 508 Server with most of the features you are crying for already in it, I am more then positive noone will sit here and tell you how to do each and everythiong most people can’t figur it out them selves I have not seen one server yet with the “Real” gfx, and emotes like the 508+.

you do realize your basicly asking for a 508 server converted for a 317 Cleint right???

Read full topic

item.title: How could i
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

k GOT IT
found all in my client.java

First of all find public boolean DCDamg = false;
If u find tht Put up tht this public int pkPoints = 0;
Xd tht was the first step Easy

Now for the 2nd,

Now still in client.java find } else if (token.equals("character-retaliate")) { or this } else if (token.equals("character-pcpoints")) {
if u found tht u wil see bla bla pc points pcPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);
thts what u gonna see under pc points JUST under that add ; } else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) { pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);
K thts pk points , it doesnt matter k , just follow other stephs now;

Now find :" You have defeated"
above tht add killerz.pkPoints += 5; tht 5 = how much u want to get pvp points per kill , now other step

Find characterfile.write("character-saradomin = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(saraKills), 0, Integer.toString(saraKills).length()); characterfile.newLine();
Under that add : characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();
K tht makes , to see how much ur characters pvp points have (itspk points for now but u wil change it il tell how just follow ok )
other step : Find "combat" u need to do CTRL+F k , if u type it u need put in “”""" , k u found tht , lets add the command to see other ppl pvp points or see your own put under tht if(command.startsWith("pvp")) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sM(""+playerName+" is Watching you're PVP points!"); sM("This player has currently "+c.pkPoints+" PVP Points."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mypvp")) { sM("You have currently " +pkPoints+ " PVP Points!"); } k now u see i changed pk points into pvp points Now ur happy , ppl can’t see thts pk points , cuz pk n pvp is same i guess
k now for the last step GO TO TEXTHANDLER.JAVA !! but save client.java!

k u opened it , u wil see at the top , Qp: +questPoints
Easy now , u see the QP right? , change tht into PVP tht makes ppl wil see at the stat tab , PVP , now to set the pvp points right of the PVP ; remove +questpoints Replace tht in +c.pkPoints

Ugh now ur done save n compile xD normally 0 errors if u use deltascape , Source i sended woeshiescape , pwnscape , Thee underground iv tried tht on those 3 ; so it should work

Sorry for my bad english , but i hope you understand me , i did MY JOB! xD

Georgio[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2009, 03:48:33 am[/size][hr]Now it should work k ,

all u need to do , is find a tutorial or however u spell it ,

to use the pvp points (pkpoints) , in a shop thts it n ur done xD

Georgio

Read full topic
